content.rendered:
York Street Spa Massages

Our RMTs use a variety of ottawa massage techniques tailored to fit your specific needs to increase circulation, relieve muscle tension and promote relaxation and flexibility. Excellent for someone looking for a basic massage.

30 min

$75

60 min

$105

75 min

$135

90 min

$165

Couples’ Massage

This advanced skin treatment is a customized fusion of result focused facial techniques, green chemistry and skin enhancing massage. Your therapist will target signs of aging, acne and sun damage in order to retexturize, lift, firm, calm and clear your skin.

60 min

$115 / Per Person

90 min

$170 / Per Person

Sport Massage

Reduce muscle tension, prevent injury and promote flexibility. Tailored to each individual athlete’s specific needs, we use techniques that include pressure application along with stretching techniques.

30 min

$80

60 min

$120

90 min

$185

Pregnancy Massage

Enjoy a calming, comforting and relaxing experience designed to care for the special needs of the mother-to-be using our pregnancy ottawa massage pillow for extra comfort.

30 min

$75

60 min

$105

Aromatherapy Massage

Restore balance, detoxify and energize your entire body with this customized massage using a personalized blend of aveda’s pure flower essences and essential oils.

30 min

$80

60 min

$120

90 min

$170

Stress Fix Massage

Clinically proven to reduce feelings of stress, the stress-fix aroma with lavender and clary sage is incorporated throughout this body massage that combines swedish and deep tissue massage acupressure points to calm and rejuvenate.

60 min

$130

90 min

$175

Hot Stone Massage

Get rid of your stress and achieve a sense of well-being and total relaxation with this comforting and healing treatment. Hot stone therapy is an ancient treatment used for relaxation, healing, and centring purposes using volcanic stones for optimal heat penetration. The hot stone massage is especially beneficial for those who suffer from the chronic pain of arthritis, fibromyalgia or a recent injury.

* Add $15 Stress-fix aroma for ultimate stress release

60 min

$125

90 min

$190

Reiki Massage

REIKI - 60 min

$105

REIKI - 90 min

$165

aROMA REIKI - 60 min

$120

aROMA REIKI - 90 min

$185

  • York Street Ottawa Spa Invites You To Freshen Up After Your Ottawa Massage With A Wash And Style!
  • Visit Our ‘SALON’ Page For Pricing And A List Of Our Hair Services.
  • Prices Are Subject To Change Without Notice.
  • All Pricing Will Have Additional Ontario Sales Tax At The Time Of Purchase.
